name: Bizdom
overview:
Bizdom provides comprehensive, real-world training, mentorship, and support for entrepreneurs who have a burning passion and determination to build their own growth-oriented, Detroit-based business.

During their four month business development program, they provide entrepreneurs with practical business knowledge taught by seasoned business professionals. Through an intense and challenging series of training and feedback sessions, they work with our entrepreneurs to develop a business plan for a Detroit-based business. Those who complete this business development program and develop a business plan approved by their Bizdom Fund will receive funding for the business described in the plan and our continuous guidance in launching and leading the business.

Our services are provided entirely free to our entrepreneurs and living stipends are available. We are a not-for profit headquartered in Detroit’s Cultural Center with state-of-the-art training facilities and work space for our entrepreneurs to use as they develop their business concept. They are surrounded by a family of growth-oriented successful companies like Quicken Loans, Fathead, ePrize, etc., who provide the program with the expertise, guidance and support necessary to launch successful businesses.
